mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR.USERINFO(ID, NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, AUTH, DELFLAG, JOINDATE) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, 'U', 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE USERINFO SET PASSWORD=#{password} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, AUTH, DELFLAG, JOINDATE FROM( SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, AUTH, DELFLAG, JOINDATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JOINDATE) RN FROM USERINFO ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
